contributionDescription: I have been a early contributor to Optimism and have been a loyal investor and believer of OP and its projects. I also believed that this is the future of crypto and being an influencer in my community, have done my best to promote the project after doing my due diligence. I am not doing this for rewards but strongly believe in the core strength of the team and the project
impactDescription: by actively participating in the governance pools and investing in the protocol and related projects, I have done my contributions from the say one and have also promoted the fair knowledge of crypto amongst my family and friends. I am a professional financial planner and an active media person and believe in promoting the right things
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, Governance & Tokens, Blockchain Education
